CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing High-Speed Trains relative to Ferry Services?
SRP.A: High-Speed Trains is {below} Ferry Services in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing High-Speed Trains relative to Car Rentals?
SRP.A: High-Speed Trains is {below} Car Rentals in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing International Terminals relative to High-Speed Trains?
SRP.A: International Terminals is {below} High-Speed Trains in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total luggage loss rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Ferry Services}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total luggage loss rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Shared Ride}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is International Terminals's minimum Luggage Loss Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: International Terminals's minimum Luggage Loss Rate is in {2003}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is High-Speed Trains's maximum Luggage Loss Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: High-Speed Trains's maximum Luggage Loss Rate is in {1996}.

NC.Q: Was the total Luggage Loss Rate in 1993 higher or lower than in 2002?
NC.A: The total luggage loss rate in 1993 was {higher} than in 2002.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 1999, was the average total Luggage Loss Rate higher or lower than between 2005 and 2008?
NC.A: The average total luggage loss rate between 1991 and 1999 was {higher} than between 2005 and 2008.

NC.Q: Between 1997 and 2006, was the average total Luggage Loss Rate higher or lower than between 2002 and 2010?
NC.A: The average total luggage loss rate between 1997 and 2006 was {higher} than between 2002 and 2010.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2014, did the total Luggage Loss Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1991 and 1993?
NC.A: The change in total luggage loss rate between 1999 and 2014 was {larger} than between 1991 and 1993.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Ferry Services} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Bus Stations and Car Rentals first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Bus Stations and Car Rentals first exchanged leading positions in {1992}.
